channel.title: 法新社

item.title: 视频：科学家研究南极哺乳动物体内的汞含量 海洋生物学家正在研究数千公里外采矿等活动中使用的有毒重金属对海豹等大型哺乳动物的影响📹 @JuanRestrepoCol📸 @jbarreto1974#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: Scientists study levels of mercury in Antarctic mammals

Marine biologists are studying the impact of the toxic heavy metal, used in activities such as mining thousands of kilometres away, on large mammals such as seals

📹 @JuanRestrepoCol
📸 @jbarreto1974#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/vPI7Z6S0SK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 检察官周二表示，德国警方逮捕了一名臭名昭著的极左翼激进组织巴德尔-迈因霍夫（Baader-Meinhof）帮派的逃犯，他因谋杀未遂和其他罪行潜逃了 30 多年，⬇️。
item.description:
German police have arrested a fugitive member of the notorious far-left militant group the Baader-Meinhof gang after more than 30 years on the run for attempted murder and other crimes, prosecutors said on Tuesday ⬇️ https://t.co/CgSlx56ZvM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇩🇿 阿尔及利亚为非洲最大清真寺举行落成典礼阿卜杜勒-马吉德-特布恩总统为世界第三大清真寺阿尔及尔大清真寺正式举行落成典礼，该清真寺于 2020 年 10 月首次开放祈祷。📹 阿尔及利亚总统📸 Ryad Kramdi#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇩🇿 Algeria inaugurates Africa's largest mosque

President Abdelmadjid Tebboune has officially inaugurated the Grand Mosque of Algiers, the third largest in the world, which first opened for prayers in October 2020.

📹 ALGERIAN PRESIDENCY
📸 Ryad Kramdi#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/PmWrrmBgJQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 曼联主帅埃里克-滕哈格表示，表现不佳的巴西边锋安东尼具有 "反击 "的性格，因为他之前曾在阿贾克斯管理过这名球员 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag says under-performing Brazil winger Antony has the character to "fight back" based on his previous experience of managing the player at Ajax ➡️ https://t.co/HgPjem0QeT #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/Wy2PrzAGq3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇭🇰 香港罕见抗议活动为新安全法敲响警钟活动人士公开抗议政府制定新国家安全法的计划，称其缺乏民主监督和人权保障 ➡️
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇭🇰 Rare Hong Kong protest sounds alarm on new security law

Activists staged a public protest against government plans for a new national security law, saying it lacks democratic oversight and human rights safeguards ➡️ https://t.co/DammeFy6zK pic.twitter.com/VaoVc9F9H9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇸🇪 匈牙利批准北约申请后瑞典人 "松了一口气 "斯德哥尔摩居民对这一消息表示欢迎，这为俄罗斯入侵乌克兰引发的军事同盟扩大扫清了最后的障碍，一位居民说北约将使他们 "更安全"。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇸🇪 Swedes 'relieved' after Hungary ratifies NATO bid

Stockholm residents welcomed the news, which clears the final obstacle to an enlargement of the military alliance spurred by Russia's invasion of Ukraine, with one saying NATO will make them "safer" pic.twitter.com/NtAf4aQlhv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 斯里兰卡国家航空公司周二指责一只老鼠导致一架飞机停飞三天，引发了混乱的航班延误，人们担心这将吓跑资金短缺的航空公司的投资者 ⬇️
item.description:
Sri Lanka's national airline on Tuesday blamed a rat for grounding a plane for three days, sparking chaotic delays and fears it will scare off investors for the cash-strapped carrier ⬇️ https://t.co/1BvuBUAAQ4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: #欧盟议会批准了有争议的生物多样性立法，推翻了推翻激怒欧洲农民的法案的企图
item.description:
#BREAKING EU parliament approves contested biodiversity legislation, overriding attempts to shoot down bill which has angered European farmers pic.twitter.com/7KwwKnCi8T

item.title: 俄罗斯法院周二判处顶级人权运动人士奥列格-奥尔洛夫（Oleg Orlov）两年半监禁，原因是他谴责俄罗斯对乌克兰的攻击 ➡️
item.description:
A Russian court on Tuesday sentenced top human rights campaigner Oleg Orlov to two and a half years in jail for denouncing Russia's assault on Ukraine ➡️ https://t.co/FUwR6NEtTH pic.twitter.com/W2g13RTUIh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 法国政府周二颁布了一项法令，禁止在素食产品标签上使用 "牛排"、"火腿 "和其他肉类词汇，称这些词汇仅用于肉类⬇️。
item.description:
The French government issued a decree on Tuesday banning the use of "steak", "ham" and other meaty terms on vegetarian product labels, saying they were reserved for meat alone ⬇️ https://t.co/XbUvZLVtMQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 破纪录的投影照亮了东京的摩天大楼。东京市政府总部的宏伟塔楼现在是世界上最大的永久性投影绘图显示屏的所在地，政府官员希望它将成为吸引游客的新景点。
item.description:
Record-breaking projections light up Tokyo skyscraper.

The imposing towers of Tokyo's city government headquarters are now home to the world's largest permanent projection mapping display, which officials hope will become a new tourist drawhttps://t.co/bX6YbtRYJ4 pic.twitter.com/4VKulwjlyN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 德国调查柏林电影节的反犹主义风波。几位获奖者被指控在舞台上发表了与以色列军事攻击有关的反犹言论。
item.description:
Germany probes Berlin film festival in anti-Semitism row.

Several winners are accused of making anti-Semitic remarks on stage in relation to Israel's military assault, which began after an attack by the Palestinian militant group Hamashttps://t.co/NYSIMvodyM pic.twitter.com/tY8hvqWw3n

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 香港罕见的抗议活动......香港活动人士抗议政府的新国家安全法计划，称其缺乏民主监督和人权保障。
item.description:
Rare Hong Kong protest.

Hong Kong activists have protested against government plans for a new national security law, saying it lacks democratic oversight and human rights safeguards.

Public demonstrations have all but vanished in the cityhttps://t.co/ofIILxqaJK pic.twitter.com/7TNq6AO2w6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 残奥会负责人希望巴黎残奥会能实现场场爆满和广泛的电视转播。到目前为止，280 万张门票中只售出了不到 100 万张，但国际残奥会主席坚持认为，在残奥会开幕前这么长时间出现这种情况是 "正常的"。
item.description:
Paralympics chief hopes for full stadiums and extensive TV coverage in Paris.

Less than one million tickets out of a total of 2.8 million have been sold so far, but the IPC president insists it is a "normal" situation this long before a Paralympicshttps://t.co/88BFCLSjU1 pic.twitter.com/gJNQDIHgnj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: #警方称发现失踪的澳大利亚电视节目主持人和男友的尸体
item.description:
#BREAKING Bodies of missing Australian TV presenter, boyfriend found, police say pic.twitter.com/BCWZzCldEz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 加入北约对瑞典意味着什么？ 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰事件的刺激下，最后一个被拒之门外的匈牙利批准了瑞典加入北约的申请，斯德哥尔摩的居民说他们对这一消息 "松了一口气"。
item.description:
What does NATO entry mean for Sweden? https://t.co/WCQLTBK1Aw

VIDEO: After last holdout Hungary ratified Sweden's NATO bid, which was spurred by Russia's invasion of Ukraine, residents of Stockholm say they are "relieved" at the news pic.twitter.com/HB9N9kNW2o

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）表示，停火最快将于下周一开始，协议可能包括用加沙的数十名人质交换数百名巴勒斯坦被拘留者。
item.description:
US eyes Israel-Hamas ceasefire by next week.

The ceasefire could start as soon as Monday, US President Joe Biden says, in a deal that could include the exchange of dozens of hostages held in Gaza for several hundred Palestinian detaineeshttps://t.co/NJQbw2uriW pic.twitter.com/cVWSS3nhGe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 视频： 秘鲁一家动物园的工作人员利用喷水和冰冻水果帮助动物们抵御热浪
item.description:
VIDEO: With water sprays and frozen fruit, staff at a zoo in Peru are looking to help their animals beat a heatwave pic.twitter.com/xEADJKdxO2

item.title: 蒙古遭遇冬季极端天气，200 万动物死亡

2 million animals dead as extreme winter weather hits Mongoliahttps://t.co/xcJlwxck7k pic.twitter.com/YNaBY76TZA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周一宣布采取新措施，帮助乌克兰抗击俄罗斯入侵，并表示甚至不排除西方国家派遣地面部队以实现欧洲击败莫斯科的目标。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron announced Monday new steps to boost Ukraine in its fight against the Russian invasion, saying not even the sending of Western ground troops was ruled out to achieve Europe's goal of defeating Moscowhttps://t.co/qJ81I5K4YU pic.twitter.com/0EY6IaXCCO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国周一发布的一份报告显示，波音公司的员工对该航空巨头在2018年和2019年致命空难后实施的安全报告系统变更感到困惑和不信任 ⬇️
item.description:
Boeing employees are confused and distrustful of changes to safety reporting systems implemented by the aerospace giant after fatal plane crashes in 2018 and 2019, according to a US report released Monday ⬇️https://t.co/Hz4YD3PEOd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.description:
#BREAKING Australian police investigating Taylor Swift's dad for alleged assault pic.twitter.com/CSporuad3N

item.title: 周一，美国最高法院在一起可能决定社交媒体未来的案件中，听取了关于限制内容审核的两项州法律是否符合宪法的辩论
item.description:
The US Supreme Court, in a case that could determine the future of social media, heard arguments on Monday about whether a pair of state laws that limit content moderation are constitutionalhttps://t.co/nKNJcVuNCc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）下月首次刑事审判的检察官周一要求法官对这位前总统下达禁言令，理由是他有诋毁证人的记录 ⬇️。
item.description:
The prosecutors in Donald Trump's first criminal trial next month asked Monday for the judge to impose a gag order on the former president, arguing that he had a record of disparaging witnesses ⬇️https://t.co/RBjt2FJGEX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024
